hero.title:
Hi! I'm
Marco Stari
hero.subtitle: I'd be delighted to introduce you to some of the projects I've worked on as a full stack developer
about.title: About me
about.description:
Marco lives in Pordenone in Friuli Venezia Giulia, he has always been passionate about technology and in particular about programming.

At 12 years old he started creating his first videogames with GameMaker and from that moment on he never stopped coding. He studied at the ITST J.F. Kennedy of Pordenone, specializing in computer science, during which he acquired more in-depth technical knowledge on both the HW and SW side.

In the meantime he keeps on making experience creating various projects using: c/c++, java, c# with Unity and Xamarin, html/css/js, React js, dart with Flutter, python, shell-script.

Some of these also become real apps being also published in the android play store.
Now he is working at Electrolux in Porcia (PN) as an Akronos Technologies employee.
front-end.subtitle: I like to turn abstract concepts into something real through a GUI :)
front-end.text:
Since I was a kid, I‚Äôve always been a fan of order, symmetry and comfort.

I see creating web or mobile programs/applications as somewhat of an art that reaches its glory when the product is easily understood and used by the end user. At the same time, keeping the code clean and efficient is essential to make the product open to new features or changes.
back-end.subtitle: A stunning Front-End is nothing without a solid Back-End.
back-end.text: The Back-End has never been my main interest, but I‚Äôve always seen it as a key part of my work and therefore I‚Äôve always tried to deepen my knowledge in this sector.
design.subtitle: I love crafting and studying design to offer the best user experience possible.
design.text:
My interest in design started while creating my first games and apps. I‚Äôve always enjoyed making my projects look pretty as well as functional.

As a result, alongside my programming studies, I also started studying the basic aspects of design and the psychology behind it.
contact.title: Let‚Äôs get in touch
